H0.text: Red is the color of visible light that has the longest wavelength.

H1.text: Blue is the color of visible light that has the longest wavelength.

H2.text: Green is the color of visible light that has the longest wavelength.

H3.text: Orange is the color of visible light that has the longest wavelength among the colors of visible light.

A4.text: A typical human eye will respond to wavelengths from about 380 to about 750 nanometers.

A5.text: Blue light has a wavelength range of approximately 450â€“495 nanometers.
